item.title: PROVIDENT FINANCIAL HOLDINGS INC 10-K
item.description: PROVIDENT FINANCIAL HOLDINGS INC, which is in the Savings Institution, Federally Chartered [6035] industry, SEC 10-K filing on September 03, 2021 had 47055 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: loans - 880 instances bank - 564 instances loan - 559 instances 30 - 524 instances 2021 - 511 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
